es.ucm.fdi.gaia.recolibry.api

Interface RecommenderAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecommenderJColibri, RecommenderMahoutCFUser

    public interface RecommenderAlgorithm
    This interface specifies the main structure of all recommender algorithm used in RecoLibry. This interface should be implemented when a new algorithm is introduced in RecoLibry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean close()
      Method to finish and close a recommender algorithm.
      boolean init()
      Method to initialize a recommender algorithm.
      java.util.List<RecommenderResult> recommend(Query query)
      Method to calculate a recommendation in the algorithm implemented.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        boolean init()
        Method to initialize a recommender algorithm. For example, if the algorithm has a training step, it is implemented in this method.
        Returns:
        true when the algorithm is initialized correctly, false in other case.

      • recommend

        java.util.List<RecommenderResult> recommend(Query query)
        Method to calculate a recommendation in the algorithm implemented.
        Parameters:
        query - Query that contains the information to make a recomendation.
        Returns:
        List of elements recommended by the algorithm.

      • close

        boolean close()
        Method to finish and close a recommender algorithm. For example, if the algorithm needs to save a new model, it is implemented in this method.
        Returns:
        true when the algorithm is finished and closed correctly, false in other case.
